content: body until there is just over the amount used for the cast on and ribbing remaining then work the ribbing and bind off for example if the yarn weighed 100 grams before you began and your cast on and ribbing used 18 grams knit the body until you have around 20 grams remaining before working the ribbing and bind off or b weigh the yarn before you begin work the cast on and ribbing then knit the body until the yarn weighs just under half of what it weighed before you began count how many rounds of the body were knit at that point then knit the same number of rounds again before working the ribbing and binding off for example if the yarn weighed 100 grams before you began knit until it weighs around 48 grams or so count how many body rounds you knit and work that many body rounds again before working the ribbing and bind off schematic 22 circumference 10 tall light as a feather cowl katie herrod 2025 v 1 page 4 pattern the symbols will be on either side of instructions that will need repeating as directed co 120 sts place bor marker and join to work in the round being careful not to twist the stitches ribbing establish 2x1 ribbing k2 p1 to end of round continue in 2x1 ribbing for a total of 12 rounds body establish waffle stitch pattern rounds 1-2 k all sts to end of round rounds 3-4 p2 k1 to end of round repeat rounds 1-4 for 52 more rounds resulting in a total of 56 rounds and 14 pattern repeats or until you reach your desired length repeat rounds 1-2 once more ribbing establish ribbing k2 p1 to end of round continue in 2x1 ribbing for a total of 12 rounds
